price: Salaata gadidhaabaa, isa sodaadhaa, Innis Isa gara Isaatti walitti qabamtaniidha.
arabic: وَأَنۡ أَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَٱتَّقُوهُۚ وَهُوَ ٱلَّذِيٓ إِلَيۡهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: wa-an aqīmū al-ṣalata wa-ittaqūhu wahuwa alladhī ilayhi tuḥ'sharūna
